verses.t: And{G2532} it came to pass{G1096}, as he{G846} went{G2064} into{G1519} the house{G3624} of one{G5100} of the chief{G3588} Pharisees{G3588} to eat{G5315} bread{G740} on the sabbath day{G4521}, that{G2532} they{G846} watched{G3906} him{G846}.UNSURE: Where to tag preposition "en".
And{G2532}, behold{G2400}, there was{G2258} a certain{G5100} man{G444} before{G1715} him{G846} which had the dropsy{G5203}.
And{G2532} Jesus{G3588} answering{G611} spake{G2036} unto{G4314} the lawyers{G3544} and{G2532} Pharisees{G5330}, saying{G3004}, Is it lawful{G1832} to heal{G2323} on the sabbath day{G3588}?
And{G1161} they held their peace{G2270}. And{G2532} he took{G1949} him, and healed{G2390} him{G846}, and{G2532} let him go{G630};

And{G2532} answered{G611} them{G846}, saying{G2036}, Which{G5101} of you{G5216} shall have{G1706} an ass{G3688} or{G2228} an ox{G1016} fallen{G1706} into{G1519} a pit{G5421}, and{G2532} will not{G3756} straightway{G2112} pull{G385} him{G846} out{G385} on{G1722} the sabbath{G3588} day{G3588}?
And{G2532} they could{G2480} not{G3756} answer{G470} him{G846} again{G470} to{G4314} these things{G5023}.

And{G1161} he put forth{G3004} a parable{G3850} to{G4314} those which{G3588} were bidden{G2564}, when he marked{G1907} how{G4459} they chose out{G1586} the chief rooms{G3588}; saying{G3004} unto{G4314} them{G846},

When{G3752} thou art bidden{G2564} of{G5259} any{G5100} man to{G1519} a wedding{G1062}, sit{G2625} not{G3361} down{G2625} in{G1519} the highest room{G3588}; lest{G3379} a more honourable man{G1784} than thou{G4675} be{G5600} bidden{G2564} of{G5259} him{G846};

And{G2532} he{G3588} that bade{G2564} thee{G4571} and{G2532} him{G846} come{G2064} and say{G2046} to thee{G4671}, Give{G1325} this man{G5129} place{G5117}; and{G2532} thou{G756} begin{G756} with{G3326} shame{G152} to take{G2722} the lowest{G2078} room{G5117}.

But{G235} when{G3752} thou art bidden{G2564}, go{G4198} and sit down{G377} in{G1519} the lowest{G2078} room{G5117}; that{G2443} when{G3752} he that bade{G2564} thee{G4571} cometh{G2064}, he may say{G2036} unto thee{G4671}, Friend{G5384}, go up{G4320} higher{G511}: then{G5119} shalt{G2071} thou{G4671} have worship{G1391} in the presence{G1799} of them that{G3588} sit at meat with{G4873} thee{G4671}.
For{G3754} whosoever{G3956} exalteth{G5312} himself{G1438} shall be abased{G5013}; and{G2532} he that{G3588} humbleth{G5013} himself{G1438} shall be exalted{G5312}.

Then{G1161} said he{G3004} also{G2532} to him{G846} that{G3588} bade him{G2564}, When{G3752} thou makest{G4160} a dinner{G712} or{G2228} a supper{G1173}, call{G5455} not{G3361} thy{G4675} friends{G5384}, nor{G3366} thy{G4675} brethren{G3588}, neither{G3366} thy{G4675} kinsmen{G4773}, nor{G3366} thy rich{G4145} neighbours{G1069}; lest{G3379} they{G846} also{G2532} bid{G479} thee{G4571} again{G479}, and{G2532} a recompence{G468} be made{G1096} thee{G4671}.
But{G235} when{G3752} thou makest{G4160} a feast{G1403}, call{G2564} the poor{G4434}, the maimed{G376}, the lame{G5560}, the blind{G5185}:

And{G2532} thou{G4671} shalt be{G2071} blessed{G3107}; for{G3754} they cannot{G2192} recompense{G467} thee{G4671}: for{G1063} thou shalt be recompensed{G467} at{G1722} the resurrection{G3588} of the just{G1342}.

And{G1161} when one{G5100} of them that{G3588} sat at meat with him{G4873} heard{G191} these things{G5023}, he said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Blessed{G3107} is he that{G3739} shall eat{G5315} bread{G740} in{G1722} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588}.
Then{G1161} said he{G2036} unto him{G846}, A certain{G5100} man{G444} made{G4160} a great{G3173} supper{G1173}, and{G2532} bade{G2564} many{G4183}:

And{G2532} sent{G649} his{G846} servant{G3588} at supper{G3588} time{G3588} to say{G2036} to them that{G3588} were bidden{G2564}, Come{G2064}; for{G3754} all things{G3956} are{G2076} now{G2235} ready{G2092}.

And{G2532} they all{G3956} with{G575} one{G1520} consent began{G756} to make excuse{G3868}. The first{G4413} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, I have bought{G59} a piece of ground{G68}, and{G2532} I must needs{G318} go{G1831} and{G2532} see{G1492} it{G846}: I pray{G2065} thee{G4571} have{G2192} me{G3165} excused{G3868}.

And{G2532} another{G2087} said{G2036}, I have bought{G59} five{G4002} yoke{G2201} of oxen{G1016}, and{G2532} I go{G4198} to prove{G1381} them{G846}: I pray{G2065} thee{G4571} have{G2192} me{G3165} excused{G3868}.
And{G2532} another{G2087} said{G2036}, I have married{G1060} a wife{G1135}, and{G2532} therefore{G1223} I cannot{G1410} come{G2064}.

So{G2532} that{G1565} servant{G3588} came{G3854}, and shewed{G518} his{G846} lord{G3588} these things{G5023}. Then{G5119} the master of the house{G3588} being angry{G3710}said{G2036} to his{G846} servant{G3588}, Go out{G1831} quickly{G5030} into{G1519} the streets{G4113} and{G2532} lanes{G4505} of the city{G4172}, and{G2532} bring in{G1521} hither{G5602} the poor{G4434}, and{G2532} the maimed{G376}, and{G2532} the halt{G5560}, and{G2532} the blind{G5185}.
And{G2532} the servant{G3588} said{G2036}, Lord{G2962}, it is done{G1096} as{G5613} thou hast commanded{G2004}, and{G2532} yet{G2089} there is{G2076} room{G5117}.

And{G2532} the lord{G3588} said{G2036} unto{G4314} the servant{G3588}, Go out{G1831} into{G1519} the highways{G3588} and{G2532} hedges{G5418}, and{G2532} compel{G315} them to come in{G1525}, that{G2443} my{G3450} house{G3588} may be filled{G1072}.
For{G1063} I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, That{G3754} none{G3762} of those{G1565} men{G3588} which{G3588} were bidden{G2564} shall taste{G1089} of my{G3450} supper{G3588}.
And{G1161} there went{G4848} great{G4183} multitudes{G3793} with{G4848} him{G846}: and{G2532} he turned{G4762}, and said{G2036} unto{G4314} them{G846},NOTE! Unable to manipulate tags!

If{G1487} any{G5100} man come{G2064} to{G4314} me{G3165}, and{G2532} hate{G3404} not{G3756} his{G1438} father{G3588}, and{G2532} mother{G3588}, and{G2532} wife{G3588}, and{G2532} children{G3588}, and{G2532} brethren{G3588}, and{G2532} sisters{G3588}, yea{G2089}, and{G1161} his own{G1438} life{G5590} also{G2532}, he cannot{G1410} be{G1511} my{G3450} disciple{G3101}.
And{G2532} whosoever{G3748} doth{G941} not{G3756} bear{G941} his{G846} cross{G3588}, and{G2532} come{G2064} after{G3694} me{G3450}, cannot{G1410} be{G1511} my{G3450} disciple{G3101}.

For{G1063} which{G5101} of{G1537} you{G5216}, intending{G2309} to{G4314} build{G3618} a tower{G4444}, sitteth{G2523} not{G3780} down{G2523} first{G4412}, and counteth{G5585} the cost{G3588}, whether{G1487} he have{G2192} sufficient to finish{G535} it?

Lest{G3379} haply{G2443}, after he{G846} hath laid{G5087} the foundation{G2310}, and{G2532} is{G2480} not{G3361} able{G2480} to finish{G1615} it, all{G3956} that behold{G2334} it begin{G756} to mock{G1702} him{G846},
Saying{G3004}, This{G3778} man{G3588} began{G756} to build{G3618}, and{G2532} was{G2480} not{G3756} able{G2480} to finish{G1615}.

Or{G2228} what{G5101} king{G935}, going{G4198} to make{G4820} war{G4171} against{G1519} another{G2087} king{G935}, sitteth{G2523} not{G3780} down{G2523} first{G4412}, and consulteth{G1011} whether{G1487} he be{G2076} able{G1415} with{G1722} ten{G1176} thousand{G5505} to meet him{G528} that{G3588} cometh{G2064} against{G1909} him{G846} with{G3326} twenty{G1501} thousand{G5505}?
Or{G1161} else{G1487}, while the other{G846} is{G5607} yet{G2089} a great way off{G4206}, he sendeth{G649} an ambassage{G4242}, and desireth conditions{G2065} of{G4314} peace{G1515}.
So{G3767}likewise{G3779}, whosoever he{G3956} be of{G1537} you{G5216} that{G3739} forsaketh{G657} not{G3756} all{G3956} that he hath{G5224}, he cannot{G1410} be{G1511} my{G3450} disciple{G3101}.
Salt{G3588} is good{G2570}: but{G1161} if{G1437} the salt{G3588} have lost his savour{G3471}, wherewith{G5101} shall it be seasoned{G741}?

It is{G2076} neither{G3777} fit{G2111} for{G1519} the land{G1093}, nor yet{G3777} for{G1519} the dunghill{G2874}; but men cast{G906} it{G846} out{G1854}. He that{G3588} hath{G2192} ears{G3775} to hear{G191}, let him hear{G191}.NOTE! Unable to manipulate tags!
